long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Max.com Video Enhancer is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance your video-watching experience on Max.com by removing distracting visual elements like gradients. Specifically, the extension automatically removes page elements with class names containing BottomGradient and TopGradient, streamlining the visual presentation of video pages.

Key Features:

	•	Automatic Cleanup: Removes unwanted visual elements (gradients) from video pages on Max.com as soon as the page loads, without the need for manual interaction.
	•	Seamless Integration: Works in the background to enhance your experience without any disruptions or configurations.
	•	Focused Viewing: Provides a cleaner, distraction-free video playback environment by eliminating page clutter.

This extension only activates on URLs related to Max.com video pages, ensuring that it runs efficiently and only when necessary.

Feel free to modify the description to better fit the exact scope and purpose of your extension!
